titles.title: Housing for All Act of 2025
Housing for All Act of 2025
To address the homelessness and housing crises, to move toward the goal of providing for a home for all Americans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Financial Services, and in addition to the Committees on the Judiciary, Energy and Commerce, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
